title: Is We Dumb? | Nose Whistle. Soda. Hidden Cat. Bitch Wall.
description:
Do you ever wish a  massage therapist would shove an entire fire extinguisher up your butt? Let's talk about that, not being able to chew your own food, earning jail time for a stupid prank, blowing a million dollars because you failed to do the one thing you were getting paid a million dollars to do, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

Bad Magic Xmas Gathering: https://www.scener.com/achristmasstory

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube:  https://youtu.be/XcfTycpSzUk

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com

Anything else: info@iswedumb.com

All Merch Inquiries: store@badmagicproductions.com

 

Merch:http://badmagicmerch.com

IG:https://instagram.com/iswedumb

 

FB:https://facebook.com/iswedumb

BadMagic YouTube:http://youtube.com/badmagicproductions

 

Official Website:http://iswedumb.com

Threads:http://badmagicmerch.com

 

Custom Music Beds by Zach Cohen

Is We Dumb?

Coeur d'Alene, ID 83816
author: dan@dancummins.tv (Dan Cummins)
